RequestHandler¶

Handles a relative word frequency request

class WordsOverTime.words.requesthandler.Request¶

Base class for clients to request an analysis.

execute()¶

Carries out the analysis, returning a Result

class WordsOverTime.words.requesthandler.RequestsExecuteThread(requests, email)¶

Subclasses threading.Thread to execute a list of Requests

class WordsOverTime.words.requesthandler.Result(xTitle, yTitle, xValues, yValues, errors=None)¶

Return object of all Requests Stores the result of an analysis as two parallel lists of xValues and yValues that can be plotted

generateCSV(hashStr)¶

Creates a CSV file containg the result data. The file’s name should be the hash that uniquely identifies the request that generated the data

class WordsOverTime.words.requesthandler.TfidfOverTimeRequest(dateRange, granularity, wordList, hashStr)¶

Handles an average tfidf request

Handles a word frequency request

WordsOverTime.words.requesthandler.sortXAndY(xValues, yValues)¶

Helper function that sorts parallel lists based on the first list

WordsOverTime.words.requesthandler.zipMatrices(matricesPath, hashStr)¶

Zips the matrices in the directory corresponding to the hash
